      • update

        public void update(Robot robot,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Mover> animal,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Mover> trash,
                   GameStatus gs,
                   int time,
                   int total_trash,
                   int bar_progress,
                   int bar_energy,
                   int feverTime)
        This method is to load data from model through controller, and call repaint method to draw pictures. If the robot touches trash, the light will be green. If the robot touches animals, the light will be red. If the robot is in fever time and catches trash at the same time, the robot will still be in the fever time and color of light will change to green. If the robot is in fever time and catches animals at the same time, the robot will not be in the fever time and color of light will change to red.
        Parameters:
        robot - Robot type object
        animal - Mover type object
        trash - Mover type object
        gs - Enum type object
        time - Integer type object
        bar_energy - energy bar
        bar_progress - trash bar
        total_trash - number of left trash
        feverTime - fever time count
